name: AfterWorld (itch) (vlad79x)
description:
You made a big mistake, creating chaos and terror in the world we know and love and are now being dragged to a cold world where you have to pay for your mistakes and horrible actions by obeying the rules.

Input -->

Chapter 1 - Left Mouse Button to shoot the minigun

Chapter 2 - Move your mouse to move the direction in which you are going

Chapter 3 - Left Mouse Button makes you go one direction which can be switched by clicking Right Mouse Button
